dublin_core.dcvalue: Sleep is a dynamic physiological process its primary function being the restoration of the central nervous system Because sleep disorders affect a significant part of the population the dynamic long term monitoring of human respiration plays a very important role in diagnosis and treatment
Revista medico-chirurgicală̆ a Societă̆ţ̜ii de Medici ş̧i Naturaliş̧ti din Iaş̧i
Remote respiration monitoring system for sleep apnea detection.
